about_the_game:
Christmas and Holiday cheer is here! This pack of well-known Christmas Carols (all in the public domain) are perfect for your wintery-snowy-xmas themed games!

This pack contains 6 well known xmas classic carols plus one original (all songs mixed in 2 versions: modern fully orchestral and retro 2D style) plus a bonus punk rock guitar-driven version of Jingle Bells!

Features:

* 15 songs total (6 classic carols and one original all with 2 different versions) plus one rocking bonus track
* ogg and m4a file formats included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

Tracklist:

Deck the Halls
Silent Night
Good King Wenceslas
Carol of the Shchedryk (Carol of the Bells)
What Child is This
Little Drummer Boy
Christmas Town
Jingle Bells - Punk Rock
Deck the Halls - 2D
Silent Night - 2D
Good King Wenceslas - 2D
Carol of the Shchedryk (Carol of the Bells) - 2D
What Child is This - 2D
Little Drummer Boy - 2D
Christmas Town - 2D

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Memory:512 MB RAM
